product_name: Sanuk Cabrio Poncho Shoes - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: With a laid-back vibe, the women's Sanuk Cabrio Poncho Shoes are a casual sandal/shoe combination with cotton canvas shoe uppers on sandal bottoms. Cotton canvas uppers have seams that are meant to fray, giving them that well-worn look. Loose-fitting uppers allow feet to move and spread for natural shock absorption and stability. EVA midsoles offer ample cushioning and a stable platform to walk on. Sanuk Cabrio Poncho Shoes have outsoles made with a rubber and EVA blend for durability. Closeout.
short_description: With a laid-back vibe, the women's Sanuk Cabrio Poncho Shoes are a casual sandal/shoe combination with cotton canvas shoe uppers on sandal bottoms.
